alert.note: Alert for Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 8:02AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 801 AM MST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 19 miles west of Meeker to 38 miles northwest of Fruita and moving east at 35 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Meeker around 835 AM MST. This includes the following highways... Colorado 13 between mile markers 25 and 57. Colorado 64 between mile markers 53 and 73. Colorado 139 between mile markers 21 and 46. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
